{"step_by_step_thinking": "From the documents, we can see that elastomeric impression materials are a type of silicone impression material. The 'A review of modern impression materials' document states that new addition type silicone impression materials proved superior to the other materials tested. In the 'Viscoelastic properties of elastomeric impression materials' document, it is mentioned that the elastic recovery after removal of strains applied at the setting time was measured for a representative selection of impression materials. This suggests that the material requires a hardener to set.", "answer_choice": "C"}
